website_summaries.verdict: The unusual shapes in this kit may help children to think outside the box, literally.
pros: 42-piece set with more artistic looking shapes, such as 7 letter "N" shapes, 7 letter shapes, 7 large windows, 7 arched windows, 7 double doors and 7 letter H shapes
cons: Lighter weight than traditional PicassoTiles pieces, which can make them harder to stack with other sets

customer_reviews.title: I love all Picasso magnetic tiles and keep adding to grandchildren's ...
customer_reviews.text: I love all Picasso magnetic tiles and keep adding to grandchildren's starter sets. It's always fun to watch little hands and minds design and build, and adults have just as much fun as the kids. This is one gift that I expect to be around for years. We recently added this one with windows, fences, doors or whatever the kids decide their purpose. I strongly recommend Picasso tiles! We've seen homes, parking garages, and castles made from tiles.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: In use non stop for 2yrs
customer_reviews.text: These tiles are constantly being played with! They are very sturdy, no cracks or breaks. The set with the windows are fantastic. If your kid loves to build they will love these. More economical than other brand but you don’t sacrifice the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lpo

customer_reviews.title: Our new favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: PicassoTiles are my children's new favorite toy. My 18-month-old, 4-year-old, kindergartener and 2nd grader all adore building with them any chance they get. We originally got a light board to build upon and it was great to see the lights shine through the blocks. Unfortunately, the light board was not as well built as the PicassoTiles so we had to return it, but we look forward to adding a light table to our repertoire soon so that we can build tall glowing buildings. In the meantime, we will build anywhere we can - even 3D sculptures on the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal J. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Love but ask your kids! :D
customer_reviews.text: These are great tiles and the brand is awesome! However this set was exciting for me but disappointing for the kids. I thought the different shapes and styles would be fun, but my kids were disappointed they went full flat squares like the others we have. When building they don’t want the holes in them. Other than their personal preference these tiles are great!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Alberts

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Added this to the already huge collection of magnetic tiles my boys have and was pleased with the results. These tiles are sturdy and certainly worth the money. My boys are not the easiest on these tiles but they hold up Grey and have for two plus years. I have and would buys these again without a doubt worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Clade

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Grand daughter loves these. Ive bought 3 sets of 60. You have to get enough to be creative. But will entertain for hours. Get ready though to have structures that they wont take down right away. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: rosanna king

customer_reviews.title: Great magnetic toy
customer_reviews.text: Hours of fun with these tiles. I have several different sets and they are always a hit with the 2 and 4yo and their friends. This particular set enables them to have doors and windows on their constructions. The pieces are sized perfectly for little hands to manipulate and the set contains many different colors to please everyone. The magnets are strong. There is no trouble getting them to attach though not strong enough to stay together if you try to move your creation.
customer_reviews.author: SandiewhoTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Awesome addition to our Picasso tile set!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! My boys love using these pieces to build their castles and fire stations and towers. The cut outs give them the ability to have "windows" and "garage doors" and "doors", which make their creations much more interesting. The possibilities are endless!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: I work on colors and counting with our toddlers and I love seeing what new ideas our school aged kids come ...
customer_reviews.text: There are so many possibilities with this toy. I work on colors and counting with our toddlers and I love seeing what new ideas our school aged kids come up with. This is extremely versatile and very fun for all kids absolutely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: tmejiaabcsolutions

customer_reviews.title: Creative fun!
customer_reviews.text: My twin grandchildren are two and a half years old. They LOVE these building tiles! I have purchased several sets so they have lots of choices. I have also used these tiles in my fourth grade class with much success. The kids love building and creating with each other using these tiles. Some of my tiles are 4 years old and have survived lots of use with lots of children.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H

customer_reviews.title: Great addition
customer_reviews.text: These are a great addition to our original set Of Picasso tiles. They have really added to the imagination of what we can build. Just as sturdy as the original set. Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Pleasant pumpkin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these as gifts for a 3 year old and a 4 year old. Both are DELIGHTED playing with these, building, creating (and fun for adults too). We will be adding to these sets!!
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: My 3 years old likes it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter still playing with it almost everyday, she usually play with a toy for a day and then forget it, but those she is still enjoying! I would buy more pieces so she can do more then just cubes
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Great for Many Years
customer_reviews.text: My boys have used these tiles for years and they are as good as the day we bought them. It’s been a joy to watch how they’ve evolved in playI got with them from toddlerhood to now. We buy extra sets as needed and they’re always compatible.
customer_reviews.author: KLM290

customer_reviews.title: Durable - great quality - amazing product & I highly recommend it

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!

customer_reviews.title: Fun for ages 1-8

customer_reviews.title: The creative items they come up with is wonderful and the 3 year old finds them much easier ...

customer_reviews.title: Picasso Tiles are a brilliant product for children
customer_reviews.text: Picasso Tiles are a brilliant product for children. They are addicted the moment they open the box. The use of the tiles builds cognitive skills that will help them develop. Love this.

customer_reviews.title: Great toys for kids of all ages

product_meta.title: PicassoTiles¨ PT42 Designer Artistry Kit 42pcs Set Magnet Building Tiles Clear Color Magnetic 3D Building Block - Creativity Beyond Imagination! Educational, Inspirational, Conventional, Recreational
product_meta.description:
Creativity Beyond Imagination! Learning by Playing!
Inspirational:
Fun and entertaining, perfect educational presents for school age children that will never go out of style. 

Recreational:
Entertaining for single or multiple parties, great for parent-to-child bonding with hours of fun quality time. Easy to construct and easy to put away for storage. 

Educational: Learning is Fun!
It's never too early to start developing kids creativity at a young age, PicassoTiles inspire youngsters learning by playing, children will acquire a strong sense of colors, geometrical shapes including 3D forms, number counts, magnetic polarity, architectural design as well as creativity which is the key factor to success in today's ever-changing environment. Give the youngsters a head start. 

Unconventional:
Unlike typical toys, each piece of tiles can be replaced and more tiles can always be added to build objects as big as desired. 

Dream Big and Build Big!
No limitations, scalable to build as big as desired by adding more pieces and various shapes. PicassoTiles in colossol styles. Encourage creativity which is the key factor to success in today's ever changing environments. 

In The Box
-7 x Letter N Shape
-7 x Letter I Shape
-7 x Large Window Shape
-7 x Arched Window Shape
-7 x Double Door Shape 
-7 x Letter H Shape
feature_bullets: DREAM BIG & BUILD BIG - No limitations, scalable to build as big as desired by adding more pieces to create the master piece. PicassoTiles in colossal styles.

LEARNING BY PLAYING - Never too early to start developing kids creativity. Children can acquire strong sense of color, geometrical shapes including 3D forms numbers counts, magnetic polarities & architectural design at early age.

BONDING BY PLAYING - Entertaining for single or multiple parties and feel the sense of achievement together. Suitable for all ages (3+ and up) by one party of in groups a great way to spend quality time with the family and love ones.

LEARNING IS FUN - Encourage creativity which is the key factor to success in today's ever-changing environments. Fun and entertaining, perfect educational presents for school age children that will never go out of style.
CREATIVITY BEYOND IMAGINATION - Magnet Building Tiles Clear 3D color Magnetic Building Blocks Playboards for preschool, pretend play and more. Easy to construct and easy to put away for storage.
